body_html:
finally figured it out.

The criterion function (CrossEntropyLoss) on the CPU is leaking memory, but on the GPU it is not.
i.e. if output, label are cuda tensors it does not leak, but if they are float tensors leaks happen.
I'll isolate it a bit further to verify if it's something deeper
